name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Mobile Engineer with extensive experience in developing high-performance mobile applications using **Swift** and **Kotlin**. Skilled in employing design principles such as **SOLID**, **DRY**, and architectural patterns including **MVVM**, **MVP**, and **VIPER** to create modular and maintainable code. Demonstrated expertise in **TDD** and **BDD** methodologies, ensuring high-quality software through rigorous testing practices. Adept at engaging in **Agile** methodologies, including **Scrum** and **Kanban**, to foster team collaboration and improve project delivery. Strong communicator dedicated to providing customer-focused solutions and enhancing user experience while delivering scalable, reliable applications.

experience.responsibilities:
• Employed Agile methodologies (Scrum and Kanban) for project management, ensuring timely delivery with an average sprint completion rate of **95%**.
• Designed and implemented SOLID principles and DRY best practices in mobile application development using **Swift** and **Kotlin**, enhancing code maintainability.
• Leveraged MVVM and MVP architectural patterns to create scalable and maintainable applications, improving code reusability by **40%**.
• Introduced Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) practices to boost code quality, achieving a **90%** test coverage in critical modules.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure customer-focused solutions, enhancing user satisfaction ratings by **25%**.
• Managed deployment processes and continuous integration using DevOps techniques, reducing lead time for changes by **50%**.

Utilized **Swift** and **Kotlin** to develop high-performance mobile applications adhering to **SOLID** and **DRY** principles, resulting in a 30% increase in app stability.
Implemented **MVVM**, **MVP**, and **VIPER** architectural patterns to enhance modular architecture, enabling quicker feature add-ons by 40%.
Employed **TDD** and **BDD** methodologies to improve code quality, reducing bug reports by 50% during the integration phase.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment, facilitating **Scrum** meetings and utilizing **Kanban** to optimize workflow and promote effective communication.
Engaged with stakeholders to ensure a customer-focused approach, increasing user satisfaction scores by 15% through direct feedback loops.

Utilized **Swift** and **Kotlin** to develop high-performance mobile applications aligned with customer-focused requirements, resulting in a 25% increase in user engagement.
Employed **MVVM**, **MVP**, and **VIPER** design patterns to create maintainable codebases, enhancing development speed by 30%.
Adopted **TDD** and **BDD** methodologies, leading to a reduction in defect rates by 40% during the development lifecycle.
Collaborated within **Agile** frameworks such as **Scrum** and **Kanban**, conducting bi-weekly sprints to deliver an average of **3 features** per release cycle.
Implemented **modular architecture** to improve code reusability and team collaboration, decreasing integration times by **50%**.
Fostered a culture of effective **communication** and collaboration among cross-functional teams to meet project deadlines and improve throughput.
